About This Site a simple jekyll bootstrap site for testing purposes

07 April 2014

Who runs this show?

My name is Jobe Roberts Joberrr and I work for the Government of Canada in the Department of Fisheries and Oceans.

Jekyll is new to me, I tend to use WordPress most often. Getting better at Git.

Don’t like what you see? Have suggestions?

Well, don’t hesitate, tell me what want me to know.

That’s all folks!
